verbs.description: [ARG1: Comedian Kathy Griffin] [V: appeared] [ARGM-LOC: on The View] [ARGM-TMP: Monday morning] [ARGM-PRP: to discuss her recent comeback to the comedy scene after being roundly eviscerated for her depiction of President Donald Trump with his bloody head on a pike back in 2016] .
